title: Rajasthan RSSB Clerk Grade-II & Junior Assistant Hiring 2026
overview:

title: Supreme Court Law Clerk Recruitment 2026 ‚Äì New Delhi
overview:
Supreme Court of India (SCI), New Delhi has released an official recruitment notification inviting applications for the post of Law Clerk-cum-Research Associate. A total of 90 vacancies are available under this recruitment drive.

The online application process started on 20 January 2026 and will remain open until 07 February 2026. Eligible candidates must fall within the prescribed age limits as mentioned below. Applicants are advised to carefully review the official notification before submitting their application.

üìÖ Application Schedule & Examination Plan

Online Application Start Date: 20 January 2026

Last Date to Apply Online: 07 February 2026

Final Date for Fee Payment: 07 February 2026

Written Examination Date: 07 March 2026

Admit Card Release: Before the examination

Result Declaration: To be announced

‚ö†Ô∏è Candidates should regularly check the official Supreme Court website for updates or changes in schedule.

üí∞ Application Fee Structure

All Category Candidates: ‚Çπ750

Accepted Online Payment Modes

Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking, IMPS, Mobile Wallets

üéØ Age Criteria (as on 07 February 2026)

Minimum Age: 20 Years

Maximum Age: 32 Years

üìå Age relaxation will be applicable as per Supreme Court recruitment rules.

üìä Vacancy Overview

Total Vacancies: 90 Posts

Post Name	Number of Vacancies
Law Clerk-cum-Research Associate	90
üéì Educational Qualification

Candidates must fulfill one of the following conditions:

Must be appearing in the final year of a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Law (LLB)

OR must have completed LLB from a recognized university or institution

üìù How to Submit Supreme Court Law Clerk Online Form 2026

Visit the official Supreme Court recruitment portal

Complete registration/login using valid credentials

Fill in the application form with accurate personal and academic details

Upload required documents in the prescribed format

Pay the application fee online

Submit the application on or before 07 February 2026

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Advisory:
Candidates are strongly advised to read the official notification carefully, especially details related to age limit, eligibility criteria, and important dates, before submitting the form.

üèÜ Selection Procedure

The selection process will consist of the following stages:

Part-I Written Examination (Objective Type)

Part-II Written Examination (Subjective Type)

Personal Interview

Document Verification

Medical Examination

üîó Useful Important Links

Apply Online (Registration / Login):
https://cdn3.digialm.com/EForms/configuredHtml/32912/97660/Registration.html

Download Official Notification (PDF):
https://cdn.s3waas.gov.in/s3ec0490f1f4972d133619a60c30f3559e/uploads/2026/01/2026012040.pdf

Supreme Court Official Recruitment Portal:
https://www.sci.gov.in/recruitments/

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q1. When did the Supreme Court Law Clerk application process start?
‚úî The application process started on 20 January 2026.

Q2. What is the last date to apply online?
‚úî 07 February 2026.

Q3. What is the age limit for Supreme Court Law Clerk Recruitment 2026?
‚úî Minimum 20 years and maximum 32 years as on 07 February 2026.

Q4. What educational qualification is required?
‚úî Final-year LLB students or candidates who have completed Bachelor of Law (LLB).

Q5. Where can I find official updates?
‚úî On the Supreme Court of India recruitment website.

title: RRB Group D Recruitment 2026 ‚Äì Apply Online for 22,000+ Level-1 Posts
overview:
The Railway Recruitment Boards (RRB) have issued an initial notification regarding the upcoming Group D (Level-1) Recruitment 2026 across multiple railway zones in India. Through this recruitment process, more than 22,000 tentative vacancies are expected to be filled.

The online application process is scheduled to begin from 31 January 2026, and eligible candidates will be able to submit their applications until 02 March 2026. Applicants must ensure that they meet the prescribed age limit, educational qualification, and eligibility conditions before applying.

This recruitment is a strong opportunity for 10th pass and ITI-qualified candidates seeking a secure government job in Indian Railways with steady income, allowances, and long-term career growth.

Railway RRB Group D Online Form 2026 ‚Äì Overview

Examination Name: RRB Group D (Level-1) Examination 2026

Conducting Authority: Railway Recruitment Boards (RRB)

Total Vacancies: 22,000+ (Tentative)

Job Level: Level-1 (7th Pay Commission)

Mode of Application: Online

Important Dates (Tentative)

Short Notification Release: Available Soon

Online Application Start Date: 31 January 2026

Last Date to Apply Online: 02 March 2026

Last Date for Fee Payment: 02 March 2026

Examination Date: To be announced

Exam City Intimation: Before examination

Admit Card Release: Prior to exam

Result Declaration: Will be updated later

üëâ Candidates should regularly check the official RRB website for confirmed dates.

Application Fee Details

Examination Fee

General / OBC Candidates: ‚Çπ500

SC / ST / EBC / Female / Transgender Candidates: ‚Çπ250

Fee Refund (After Appearing in CBT)

General / OBC: ‚Çπ400

SC / ST / EBC / Female / Transgender: ‚Çπ250

Accepted Payment Methods (Online):

Debit Card

Credit Card

Net Banking

IMPS

Mobile Wallets

Minimum Age: 18 Years

Maximum Age: 33 Years

Age relaxation will be applicable for reserved categories as per Railway Recruitment Board norms.

Total Vacancies

22,000+ Posts (Tentative)

RRB Group D Vacancy Details (Post-wise)
Post Name	Vacancies
Pointsman-B	To be notified
Assistant (Track Machine)	To be notified
Assistant (Bridge)	To be notified

Assistant P-Way	To be notified
Assistant (C&W)	To be notified
Assistant TRD	To be notified
Assistant (S&T)	To be notified
Assistant Loco Shed (Diesel)	To be notified
Assistant Loco Shed (Electrical)	To be notified
Assistant Operations (Electrical)	To be notified
Assistant TL & AC	To be notified
Assistant TL & AC (Workshop)	To be notified
Assistant (Workshop ‚Äì Mechanical)	To be notified
Eligibility Criteria

Candidates are eligible to apply if they fulfill any one of the following conditions:

Passed Class 10 (Matriculation) from a recognized board

Possess a National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC) issued by NCVT

How to Apply for RRB Group D Recruitment 2026

Interested candidates must apply online only before 02 March 2026

Visit the official Railway Recruitment Board website

Complete the registration and application form carefully

Upload required documents and pay the application fee

Submit the form before the deadline

Important Note:
Candidates are strongly advised to read the official notification carefully regarding age limit, eligibility, and important dates before submitting the application.

Selection Process

The selection procedure for RRB Group D (Level-1) includes the following stages:

Computer Based Test (CBT)

Physical Efficiency Test (PET)

Document Verification

Medical Examination

Pay Scale & Salary Structure (Tentative)
Salary Component	Details
Pay Commission	7th Pay Commission
Pay Level	Level-1
Basic Pay	‚Çπ18,000 per month
Dearness Allowance (DA)	As per government rules
House Rent Allowance (HRA)	As applicable
Transport Allowance	As per RRB norms
Night Duty Allowance	Applicable
Medical Facilities	For employee & family
Other Allowances	As per rules
Approx. In-Hand Salary	‚Çπ22,000 ‚Äì ‚Çπ25,000 per month
Important Links

Apply Online: Link active from 31 January 2026

Short Notice: Available Soon

Official Notification: To be released

Official Website: https://indianrailways.gov.in/

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q1. When will the online application for RRB Group D Recruitment 2026 start?
The online application process is expected to begin on 31 January 2026.

Q2. What is the last date to apply online?
The last date for submitting the application form is 02 March 2026.

Q3. What is the age limit for RRB Group D 2026?
Candidates must be between 18 and 33 years, with relaxation as per RRB rules.

Q4. What is the minimum qualification required?
Applicants must have passed Class 10 or hold a National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC).

Q5. What is the official website of Indian Railways?
The official website is https://indianrailways.gov.in/

title: UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2026 ‚Äì Online Form for 7,994 Posts
overview:
The Uttar Pradesh Subordinate Services Selection Commission (UPSSSC) has officially released a notification for the recruitment of Lekhpal posts. Through this recruitment drive, a total of 7,994 vacancies will be filled across Uttar Pradesh.

The online application process began on 29 December 2025, and eligible candidates can apply until 28 January 2026. Applicants must meet the required age limit and educational qualification as specified in the notification.
Candidates are advised to carefully review all details related to eligibility, selection process, application dates, and examination before submitting the form.

UPSSSC Lekhpal Online Form 2026 ‚Äì Overview

Recruitment Authority: UPSSSC

Post Name: Lekhpal

Total Vacancies: 7,994

Mode of Application: Online

Job Location: Uttar Pradesh

Important Dates

Application Start Date: 29 December 2025

Last Date to Apply Online: 28 January 2026

Last Date for Fee Payment: 28 January 2026

Application Correction Date: 04 February 2026

Examination Date: To be announced

Admit Card Release: Before the exam

Result Declaration: Will be updated later

Candidates should verify all updates from the official UPSSSC website.

Application Fee

General / OBC / EWS: ‚Çπ25

SC / ST: ‚Çπ25

Persons with Disabilities (PH): ‚Çπ25

Accepted Payment Methods (Online)

Debit Card

Credit Card

Net Banking

IMPS

Mobile Wallets

Age Limit (As on 01 July 2025)

Minimum Age: 18 Years

Maximum Age: 40 Years

Age relaxation will be provided to eligible categories as per UPSSSC rules.

Total Vacancies

Lekhpal: 7,994 Posts

Educational Qualification

Candidates applying for the UPSSSC Lekhpal post must have:

Passed 10+2 (Intermediate) examination from a recognized board in India

How to Apply for UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2026

Applications must be submitted online only

Visit the official UPSSSC website

Complete the registration and fill in the application form carefully

Upload required details and pay the application fee

Submit the form before 28 January 2026

Important Note:
Applicants are strongly advised to read the official notification thoroughly before applying, especially regarding age limit, eligibility, and important dates.

Selection Process

The selection for UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2026 will be conducted in the following stages:

Shortlisting based on PET Score Card

Main Written Examination

Important Links

Apply Online: Available till 28 January 2026

Official Notification: Available on UPSSSC website

Syllabus / Exam Pattern: Refer to official notification

Official Website: https://upsssc.gov.in/

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q1. When did the online application for UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2026 start?
The application process started on 29 December 2025.

Q2. What is the last date to apply online?
The last date to submit the application form is 28 January 2026.

Q3. What is the age limit for UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2026?
Candidates must be between 18 and 40 years as on 01 July 2025.

Q4. What is the minimum qualification required for Lekhpal?
Applicants must have passed Intermediate (10+2) from a recognized board.

Q5. What is the official website of UPSSSC?
The official website is https://upsssc.gov.in/
